Class LagrangeInterpolationUsingCalculus<T>

  • java.lang.Object

    public class LagrangeInterpolationUsingCalculus<T>
extends LagrangeInterpolation<T>
    Lagrange interpolation based on derivative of polynomial of X coordinate roots
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
